news.title: StarBigBloc Building Material gets shareholder approval to launch IPO
news.para: StarBigBloc Building Material aims at increasing its production capacity from the current 250,000 cubic meters per annum to over 1.2 million cubic meters per annum over the next 4–5 years.

news.title: Environmental clearance now required for large township and construction projects in Chandigarh
news.para: Similarly, building and construction projects with more than 20,000 square metres and more than 1,50,000 square metres of built-up area will also need clearance. This is as per the latest notification issued by the UT department of environment.

news.title: About 3,200 street lights found non-functional in Patna
news.para: The survey was conducted in all the 75 wards of the city ahead of the monsoon season under the directive of the municipal commissioner. A total of 19 zonal officers were instructed to inspect the street lights in their respective areas.

news.title: To regularise illegal houses, Goa government plans bill to bypass comunidade
news.para: The govt, through the bill, will empower the administrator of the comunidade to decide on the application — bypassing the comunidade — to regularise the illegal structures on the respective comunidade, not exceeding an area of 300sqm.

news.title: Government to digitise land records of Goa’s urban areas
news.para: The initiative is expected to empower citizens, improve ease of living, enhance urban planning, and reduce land-related disputes.

news.title: About 35 property tax defaulters with ₹3.6 crore dues to get notices in Gurugram
news.para: In the current financial year (FY), the property tax revenue projection is pegged at Rs 275 crore, which is less than last FY's projection of Rs 300 crore. In 2024-25, MCG generated an income of Rs 232.9 crore, which was 77% of the projected estimate.

news.title: GDA seeks central funds for Noida-Ghaziabad metro link
news.para: GDA vice chairperson Atul Vats said on Monday, "We have written to UP govt. We have quoted a grant of Rs 2,441 crore, out of which Rs 1,873 crore is for the metro project."

news.title: Brick kilns, which employ thousands in Punjab, stare at closure
news.para: The number of brick kilns has reportedly come down from roughly about 2600 in 2021-22 to a little more than half, 1500, now.

news.title: Cornerstone set to reboot with ₹1,700-crore funding from Kotak and land sale
news.para: Cornerstone is planning to raise ₹1,700 crore from Kotak Alternate Asset Managers and monetize land to fund expansion and stalled projects. This move aims to resolve a financial dispute with L&T Finance, stemming from loans sanctioned between 2017 and 2019.

news.title: Over 400 slums in Nagpur legalised
news.para: Out of these 426, 15 are under NMC jurisdiction, 50 under the state govt, 69 under NIT, and 106 under multiple other agencies among others.

news.title: Chennai: 304 survey numbers found in Pallikaranai Marsh Ramsar site
news.para: The report, prepared with satellite data and e-governance records, was submitted during a hearing in a suo motu case initiated in July 2023.

news.title: Kolkata civic body focuses on height of buildings in flight path
news.para: These guidelines are based on the AAI's colour coded zoning maps (CCZM) and dictate permissible building heights within specific zones. Construction exceeding the permissible heights requires an NoC from AAI.

news.title: Relief for 4,000 buyers as Noida authority approves co-developer for four Supertech projects
news.para: The clearance paves the way for Apex Group to step in and revive The Romano in Sector 118, North Eye and Cape Town in Sector 74, and Eco City in Sector 137.

news.title: Lucknow police arrests individual for duping over 100 people
news.para: The arrest took place on June 15 near Jyotinagar, when the STF received intelligence that Upadhyay would be visiting his now-defunct office near Kanha Upvan in Mohanlalganj to retrieve documents.

news.title: US homebuilder Lennar's posts $8.38 billion revenue in second quarter
news.para: Lennar posted second quarter revenue of $8.38 billion, above analysts' estimate of $8.16 billion, according to data compiled by LSEG.

news.title: Godrej Properties acquires 16-acre land parcel in Upper Kharadi, Pune
news.para: The development on this land will primarily comprise premium group housing and high-street retail. The project has a developable potential of 2.5 million sq ft with an estimated revenue potential of ₹3,100 crore.

news.title: Macrotech Developers changes company's name to Lodha Developers
news.para: In a regulatory filing, Macrotech Developers said, "the Registrar of Companies, Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA), has approved the change in name of the Company from 'Macrotech Developers Limited' to 'Lodha Developers Limited' with effect from June 16, 2025.

news.title: Asking prices for UK homes drop 0.3% in June: Rightmove
news.para: Prices dropped by 0.3% compared with a month earlier in Rightmove's June period, which ran from May 11 to June 7. This was the biggest drop since June 2011 and compared with a typical 0.4% rise for the period, the property website said.
